sentences.sContent: Her persistence paid off when she was offered the job of manager.
sentences.sCn: 她得到了经理的职位，不懈坚持终于有了回报。

sentences.sContent: ‘Why can’t I come?’ repeated Will with dogged persistence .
sentences.sCn: “我为什么不能去？”威尔不死心地又问了一遍。

phrases.pCn: 视觉暂留；视觉残留；持续视觉

words.tran: 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的
持续言语（指言语反复不止的病态）；持续重复的行为；执拗
坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中）
患持续言语症；表现固执

trans.tranOther: determination to do something even though it is difficult or other people oppose it
